languages.text: {n}Губернатор беспомощно пожимает плечами.{/n} "Я был слишком рад их появлению, чтобы спрашивать. Полагаю, жест почтения? Кто же поймет этих таинственных алых жрецов?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Губернатор беспомощно пожимает плечами, словно провинившийся лакей.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The governor shrugs helplessly.{/n} "I was too overjoyed at their appearance to ask. A gesture of deference, I suppose? Who can ever understand those mysterious crimson priests?"
languages.original_text: {n}Губернатор беспомощно пожимает плечами.{/n} "Я был слишком рад их появлению, чтобы спрашивать. Полагаю, жест почтения? Кто же поймет этих таинственных алых жрецов?"

traits.locale_text: {n}The Governor shrugs helplessly.{/n} "I was too overjoyed at their appearance to ask. A gesture of deference, I suppose? Who can understand these mysterious scarlet priests?"
{n}The Governor shrugs helplessly.{/n} "I was too overjoyed at their appearance to ask. A gesture of deference, I suppose? Who can understand these mysterious scarlet priests?"

{n}The Governor shrugs helplessly.{/n} "I was too overjoyed at their appearance to ask. A gesture of deference, I suppose? Who can ever understand those mysterious scarlet priests?"
{n}The governor shrugs helplessly.{/n} "I was too overjoyed at their appearance to ask. A gesture of deference, I suppose? Who can ever understand those mysterious crimson priests?"
{n}The governor shrugs helplessly.{/n} "I was too overjoyed at their appearance to ask. A gesture of deference, I suppose? Who can ever understand those mysterious crimson priests?"

languages.text: {n}总督无奈地耸了耸肩。{/n}“他们来这里的时候，我实在是太兴奋了，于是便没来得及多问。我猜，这应该是为了表示敬意吧？毕竟，有谁能真正理解那些行事神秘的红衣神甫呢？”
languages.original_text: {n}The governor shrugs helplessly.{/n} "I was too overjoyed at their appearance to ask. A gesture of deference, I suppose? Who can ever understand those mysterious crimson priests?"

traits.locale_text: {n}总督无奈地耸了耸肩。{/n}“他们来这里的时候，我实在是太兴奋了，于是便没来得及多问。我猜，这应该是为了表示敬意吧？毕竟，有谁能真正理解那些行事神秘的红衣神甫呢？”

languages.text: {n}El gobernador se encoge de hombros con gesto de impotencia.{/n} «Estaba demasiado entusiasmado por su presencia para preguntarles. ¿Una muestra de deferencia, supongo? ¿Quién sabe lo que les pasa por la cabeza a esos misteriosos sacerdotes de rojos hábitos?».
languages.original_text: {n}The governor shrugs helplessly.{/n} "I was too overjoyed at their appearance to ask. A gesture of deference, I suppose? Who can ever understand those mysterious crimson priests?"

traits.locale_text: {n}El gobernador se encoge de hombros con gesto de impotencia.{/n} «Estaba demasiado entusiasmado por su presencia para preguntarles. ¿Una muestra de deferencia, supongo? ¿Quién sabe lo que les pasa por la cabeza a esos misteriosos sacerdotes de rojos hábitos?».

languages.text: {n}Vali çaresizce omuz silkiyor.{/n} "Varlıklarından o kadar mest olmuştum ki soramadım. Bu bir saygı göstergesi sanırım. O gizemli kızıl rahipleri kim anlayabilir ki?"
languages.original_text: {n}The governor shrugs helplessly.{/n} "I was too overjoyed at their appearance to ask. A gesture of deference, I suppose? Who can ever understand those mysterious crimson priests?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Vali çaresizce omuz silkiyor.{/n} "Varlıklarından o kadar mest olmuştum ki soramadım. Bu bir saygı göstergesi sanırım. O gizemli kızıl rahipleri kim anlayabilir ki?"

languages.text: {n}総督は、力なく肩をすくめる。{/n}「彼らの見た目に喜びすぎて、尋ねることができませんでした。おそらく、敬意の表れなのでしょう？あの謎めいた深紅の司祭を理解できる者などいませんから」
languages.original_text: {n}The governor shrugs helplessly.{/n} "I was too overjoyed at their appearance to ask. A gesture of deference, I suppose? Who can ever understand those mysterious crimson priests?"

traits.locale_text: {n}総督は、力なく肩をすくめる。{/n}「彼らの見た目に喜びすぎて、尋ねることができませんでした。おそらく、敬意の表れなのでしょう？あの謎めいた深紅の司祭を理解できる者などいませんから」

languages.text: {n}Le gouverneur hausse les épaules.{/n} « J'étais bien trop obnubilé par leur apparence pour penser à poser la question. Par déférence, sans doute ? Qui saurait dire ce qui passe par la tête de ces mystérieux prêtres écarlates ? »
languages.original_text: {n}The governor shrugs helplessly.{/n} "I was too overjoyed at their appearance to ask. A gesture of deference, I suppose? Who can ever understand those mysterious crimson priests?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Le gouverneur hausse les épaules.{/n} « J'étais bien trop obnubilé par leur apparence pour penser à poser la question. Par déférence, sans doute ? Qui saurait dire ce qui passe par la tête de ces mystérieux prêtres écarlates ? »

languages.text: {n}Der Gouverneur zuckt hilflos mit den Schultern.{/n} "Ich war zu erfreut über ihre Ankunft, um zu fragen. Eine Geste der Ehrerbietung, nehme ich an? Wer versteht schon diese geheimnisvollen roten Priester?"
languages.original_text: {n}The governor shrugs helplessly.{/n} "I was too overjoyed at their appearance to ask. A gesture of deference, I suppose? Who can ever understand those mysterious crimson priests?"
